welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Foster City, a charming coastal town known for its picturesque views and friendly community. We invite you to explore and embrace the beautiful nature, delicious cuisine, and unique experiences that this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Carlos Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at San Carlos Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serves domestic flights for various airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Alaska Airlines and American Airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines and Copa Airlines

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: Serves all international flights and some domestic flights for various airlines

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Palo Alto Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Palo Alto Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Half Moon Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Half Moon Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network by selecting 'HAF Free Wifi' and entering the password provided at the information desk.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves as the hub for low-cost airlines and regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Terminal Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including restaurants, shops, and lounges.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: For those flying on private jets, the private aviation terminal at Air Terminal Airport offers a comfortable and luxurious experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Southwest, Alaska, and Delta.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as American, United, and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Air Canada, Volaris, and Hainan Airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Reid-Hillview Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Reid-Hillview Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Livermore Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Livermore Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
